Equipment Actions.Action 1: Greatsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 21 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Planetar makes 2 melee attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Healing Touch, The Planetar touches another creature and magically heals them, as well as cure them of any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness

Abilities.Ability 1: Angelic Weapons, The Planetar's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra Average 22 Radiant damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Divine Awareness, The Planetar knows if it hears a lie
Abilities.Ability 3: Innate Spellcasting, The Planetar can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Resistance, The Planetar has advantage on saving throws againts spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
